message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. How about $95?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, but I want to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, and I want to be fair. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer.
